Title: Windows API Interop Library
Description: A collection of interop code in C# for the Windows API. Key exported methods, constants and structures defined. Some extension methods for WinForms controls.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A collection of interop code in C# for the Windows API. Key exported methods, constants and structures defined. Some extension methods for WinForms controls.

Think of this a PInvoke library for key Windows API calls. Intended to be used by pulling needed source code files out of the library and not as a compiled assembly. All classes are marked "internal".
